dungeon

Class MagicRoomEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeon.MagicRoomEvent

  • public class MagicRoomEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the event when the player should step into the magic room.

    QS

      • quiz

        public void quiz()
        This method makes the player unable to move on and starts the quiz. When the question has been answered, then the player is again able to move.
